title: SOLD: T205 raw Matty and Cobb
author: tiger8mush

posts.post_title: SOLD: T205 raw Matty and Cobb
posts.post_content:
Matty - was SGC 20, diagonal crease thru head + tiny horizontal crease on upper left edge, otherwise beautiful card with touched corners and nice gold border.  Feb 26 1912 stamp on otherwise pretty clean Sweet Caporal back.
$475 shipped SOLD

Cobb - nicely centered, light corner wear, strong bold color, gold border contrasts well against green background.  Tough to find Polar Bear back has paper loss on corners but can still read majority of the write-up and stats.
$1625 shipped SOLD

Thanks for looking,
Rob
:)
